abstract: NBC announced a series of programming moves Tuesday, led by the cancellation of the Monday night drama "The Playboy Club."
snippet: NBC announced a series of programming moves Tuesday, led by the cancellation of the Monday night drama "The Playboy Club."

keywords.name: unknown
keywords.value: Rock Center With Brian Williams (TV Program)

lead_paragraph: NBC, reacting quickly to the collapse of its Monday night drama, "The Playboy Club," announced a series of programming moves Tuesday, led by the cancellation of that 10 p.m. show and the addition of a newsmagazine hosted by its main news anchor, Brian Williams.
